newsitem.title: USA: Sanwa names Michael Strauss sr VP, chief economist.
newsitem.headline: Sanwa names Michael Strauss sr VP, chief economist.

text.p: Japanese investment house Sanwa Securities Co. named Michael Strauss senior vice president and chief economist, effective Monday, the company announced.

Strauss, former chief economist at Yamaichi International (America) Securities, replaces Michelle Laughlin, who left a few months ago to become a U.S. Treasury market strategist at Prudential Securities Inc.
Strauss said he will focus on the bond market.
He left Yamaichi after 4-1/2 years in late November when the company was undergoing changes in its bond department.
